headline: As stablecoin bill heads to House, Senate shifts to market structure

headline: Semiconductor firm Sequans to raise $384M for Bitcoin treasury

headline: Bitcoin eyes $104K CME gap as analysis says 'World War 3' off the table

headline: Antier Shatters DeFi Boundaries: Debuts Enterprise-Level Stablecoin Remittance Solution
summary: NEW DELHI, June 23, 2025 /PRNewswire/ — Antier, the global leader in blockchain product development, announces the launch of its enterprise-ready stablecoin remittance platform, built for institutions demanding precision, control, and velocity in cross-border value exchange. As the world’s most trusted stablecoin development company, Antier delivers a modular, production-grade stack that modernizes the movement of … Continue reading "Antier Shatters DeFi Boundaries: Debuts Enterprise-Level Stablecoin Remittance Solution"

headline: India wants 30% of your crypto gains, but that’s not the worst part
